titleStmt.title: Christ crucified, or, The marrow of the gospel, evidently holden forth in LXXII sermons, on the whole 53. chapter of Isaiah wherein the text is clearly and judiciously opened up ... / by ... James Durham.
titleStmt.author: Durham, James, 1622-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, torn and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: Huntington Library.
